definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: drag, drag away (NH id., Ar. jar=a Aram. [[גְּרַר]], gar As. garâru, run, Zim:BP 102; etc.)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. sf. [[יְנׁרֵהוּ]] Hb Hab 1:15, [[יְגוֹרֵם]] Pr 21:7—drag away, fishes in net, fig. Hb Hab 1:15 (Chaldeans, their opponents); violence, the wicked Pr 21:7.

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: ? Sam. [[יׇגוֹר]] cf. Di) Impf. [[יִגׇּ֑ר]] Le 11:7 c. acc. cogn. [[גֵּרָה לאׁ־יִגׇּ֑ר]] = (the) cud he cheweth not, cf. also De 14:8 Sam. LXX (Di).

definitions.title: Po‘al
definitions.body: Pt. (denom.; so NH Qal & Niph.) [[מִגׁרָרוֹת]] [[בַּמְּגֵרָה]] 1Ki 7:9 sawn with the saw.

definitions.title: Hithpo.
definitions.body: [[סַעַר מִתְגּוֹרֵָר]] Je 30:23 a (sweeping) roaring whirlwind (‖ Je 23:19 has [[מִתְחוֹלֵל]]). On [[יִתְגּוֹרָרוּ]] Ho 7:14, v. I. [[גור]], [[גדד]].
